Class PizzaOrderMethods

java.lang.Object
PizzaOrderMethods
public class PizzaOrderMethods extends Object
Kristina Bogin Mayada Alani This program allows a user to make choices in a menu creates a pizza ordered to the specifications that the user desires. It walks the user through ordering, giving the user choices, which the program then uses to decide how to make the pizza and how much the cost of the pizza will be. 4/9/2024

      public static String toppingsName(String pepperoni, String sausage, String onion, String mushroom)
      Combines selected toppings in one readable String.
      Parameters:
      pepperoni - customers selection from getPepperoni() method.
      sausage - customers selection from getSausage() method.

      Returns:
      all selected toppings.
